CmdLine: echo "Europe/Berlin" > /etc/timezone &&     dpkg-reconfigure tzdata &&     apt-get -y update &&     apt-get -y upgrade &&     apt-get -y install         gdebi-core         pulseaudio &&     curl -O https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb &&     gdebi --option=APT::Get::force-yes=1,APT::Get::Assume-Yes=1 -n google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb &&     rm google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb
Commands.Name: run
